short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a referral tag from the roxkstar74 stream to all amazon, digitalocean, and umso links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a referral tag(query parameter) to all amazon links (.com and international), digitalocean.com links, and umso.com links. These tags directly support the Roxkstar74 stream on twitch - all revenue from the affiliate programs on these websites goes towards improving the stream. These tags will in no way impact your experience on any of the sites, and serve only as a free way for you to support the Roxkstar74 community.
